title: GCX
author: GCX
content: Hi, Dear Sir...Here We Buy Bitcoin/USDT/Other Major Cryptocurrencies for INR, We Pay Using IMPS/Bank Transfer/UPI Payment Method. Accepted Cryptocurrencies:1) Bitcoin2) USDT3) Ethereum4) BNB5) Cardano (ADA)6) Litecoin (LTC)7) Matic Ripple (XRP)9) Shiba (SHIB)10) Solana (SOL)11) USDC12) Doge CoinPayment Methods:1) UPI2) Phonepe3) Google Pay4) IMPS5) Paytm Wallet6) Bank TransferNote: We Buy Cryptos Regularly on Daily Basis, We Never go First. Scammers Please Stay Away. We are a Trusted Long-Term Crypto Merchants.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: GCX on January 30, 2023, 07:34:23 AMNote: We Buy Cryptos Regularly on Daily Basis, We Never go First. Scammers Please Stay Away. We are a Trusted Long-Term Crypto Merchants.It is great that you will buy regularly. As you are trying to pay via the payment method which is in India you should post on the local board of India. Another factor is that you told that you are trusted but where is the proof that you are trusted? In 7 months I could see only four posts of you where there is no trade. It means you are a newbie and as a newbie, you can't get a single dollar first from the community.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Actually there is a high risk dealing with newbies. For OP to be trusted he should start initiating business among their localities for those that are from same country to know about his reputation, maybe their trust rating may likely help him and also exposed him the more. You can move your post to this thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=122.0

comments.author: Wapinter
comments.body: Quote from: GCX on January 30, 2023, 07:34:23 AMHi, Dear Sir...Here We Buy Bitcoin/USDT/Other Major Cryptocurrencies for INR, We Pay Using IMPS/Bank Transfer/UPI Payment Method. Accepted Cryptocurrencies:1) Bitcoin2) USDT3) Ethereum4) BNB5) Cardano (ADA)6) Litecoin (LTC)7) Matic Ripple (XRP)9) Shiba (SHIB)10) Solana (SOL)11) USDC12) Doge CoinPayment Methods:1) UPI2) Phonepe3) Google Pay4) IMPS5) Paytm Wallet6) Bank TransferNote: We Buy Cryptos Regularly on Daily Basis, We Never go First. Scammers Please Stay Away. We are a Trusted Long-Term Crypto Merchants.If you believe people will send their crypto to you first, then you are highly mistaken. First build some good rep for yourself. Also mention at what rate you will buy these cryptos.

comments.author: alertoriole
comments.body: just use p2p. ofc that won't happen because you think writing in bold is enough to convince people to send you crypto or money first.

comments.author: Gladitorcomeback
comments.body: I don't think any indian will sell his crypto here. You account is quiet new and you have post only 4 posts here and no reputation here. This type of behavior are generally from scammer. You can read here detail Quote from: Tomatocage on January 19, 2013, 02:22:25 AMwatch out for the typical behavior from scammers who will usually fit at least two or three (and sometimes even more) of the following characteristics6. Straight out of Newbie mode right into Currency Exchange (PayPal, Liberty Reserve, Western Union) There is lot of trusted exchange where P2P service is available. Kucoin us best option so far for crypto exchange to recieve payment directly to any bank and Paytm. If you are trusted enough and doing regularly then look out these exchanges and apply for P2P merchant. You will get high number of seller theirs.

comments.author: GCX
comments.body: In Kucoin You can Contact me @Mahadev I am a P2P Merchant in Kucoin also.

comments.author: Edwardard
comments.body: Quote from: GCX on February 12, 2023, 05:13:36 AMIn Kucoin You can Contact me @Mahadev I am a P2P Merchant in Kucoin also.You should also specify the minimum and maximum amounts you are dealing with in the OP, to be more clear. Also, I'd say you should also be a merchant on bybit and binance, since there are more traders in these exchanges.
